testcase.name: "before each" hook: setupBeforeEach for "Add Block: Empty"

failure.message:
`cy.request()` failed on:
http://localhost:8080/Plone/
The response we received from your web server was:
> 400: Bad Request
This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`.
If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`
-----------------------------------------------------------
The request we sent was:
Method: POST URL: http://localhost:8080/Plone/ Headers: { "Connection": "keep-alive", "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 11_6_0) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Cypress/7.3.0 Chrome/89.0.4328.0 Electron/12.0.0-beta.14 Safari/537.36", "accept": "application/json", "cookie": "auth_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJzdWIiOiJhZG1pbiIsImV4cCI6MTYzNTk5MjQ2MCwiZnVsbG5hbWUiOm51bGx9.C-88cMkyDFRaM7MyuBnvW6U7u6FdVOWk4br1L6XdHjE; __ac=\"NjE2NDZkNjk2ZTo%253D\"", "authorization": "Basic YWRtaW46YWRtaW4=", "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate", "content-type": "application/json", "content-length": 306 } Body: {"@type":"Folder","id":"cypress","title":"Cypress","blocks":{"d3f1c443-583f-4e8e-a682-3bf25752a300":{"@type":"title"},"7624cf59-05d0-4055-8f55-5fd6597d84b0":{"@type":"text"}},"blocks_layout":{"items":["d3f1c443-583f-4e8e-a682-3bf25752a300","7624cf59-05d0-4055-8f55-5fd6597d84b0"]},"allow_discussion":false}
-----------------------------------------------------------
The response we got was:
Status: 400 - Bad Request Headers: { "content-length": "2197", "content-type": "application/json", "date": "Wed, 03 Nov 2021 14:21:01 GMT", "server": "waitress", "via": "waitress", "x-frame-options": "SAMEORIGIN", "x-powered-by": "Zope (www.zope.org), Python (www.python.org)" } Body: { "message": "The id \"cypress\" is invalid - it is already in use.", "traceback": [ "File \"/plone/buildout-cache/eggs/cp38/Zope-4.5.5-py3.8.egg/ZPublisher/WSGIPublisher.py\", line 162, in transaction_pubevents", " yield", "", " File \"/plone/buildout-cache/eggs/cp38/Zope-4.5.5-py3.8.egg/ZPublisher/WSGIPublisher.py\", line 371, in publish_module", " response = _publish(request, new_mod_info)", "", " File \"/plone/buildout-cache/eggs/cp38/Zope-4.5.5-py3.8.egg/ZPublisher/WSGIPublisher.py\", line 266, in publish", " result = mapply(obj,", "", " File \"/plone/buildout-cache/eggs/cp38/Zope-4.5.5-py3.8.egg/ZPublisher/mapply.py\", line 85, in mapply", " return debug(object, args, context)", "", " File \"/plone/buildout-cache/eggs/cp38/Zope-4.5.5-py3.8.egg/ZPublisher/WSGIPublisher.py\", line 63, in call_object", " return obj(*args)", "", " File \"/plone/buildout-cache/eggs/cp38/plone.rest-1.6.2-py3.8.egg/plone/rest/service.py\", line 22, in __call__", " return self.render()", "", " File \"/plone/buildout-cache/eggs/cp38/plone.restapi-8.9.1-py3.8.egg/plone/restapi/services/__init__.py\", line 19, in render", " content = self.reply()", "", " File \"/plone/buildout-cache/eggs/cp38/plone.restapi-8.9.1-py3.8.egg/plone/restapi/services/content/add.py\", line 93, in reply", " obj = add(self.context, obj, rename=not bool(id_))", "", " File \"/plone/buildout-cache/eggs/cp38/plone.restapi-8.9.1-py3.8.egg/plone/restapi/services/content/utils.py\", line 89, in add", " new_id = container._setObject(id_, obj)", "", " File \"/plone/buildout-cache/eggs/cp38/Zope-4.5.5-py3.8.egg/OFS/ObjectManager.py\", line 350, in _setObject", " v = self._checkId(id)", "", " File \"/plone/buildout-cache/eggs/cp38/Products.CMFCore-2.5.0-py3.8.egg/Products/CMFCore/Skinnable.py\", line 196, in _checkId", " return superCheckId(self, id, allow_dup)", "", " File \"/plone/buildout-cache/eggs/cp38/Zope-4.5.5-py3.8.egg/OFS/ObjectManager.py\", line 141, in checkValidId", " raise BadRequest(" ], "type": "BadRequest" }
